inclusion.criterion: Fibrosis F0-F3 (i.e. non-cirrhotic confirmed by Fibroscan <12.5kPa)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Regular visits at the low threshold facility during the last month
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Lack or unwillingness of safe contraception, pregnancy
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Coinfection with HBV (Hepatitis B Virus) or HIV
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Severe comorbidities resulting in a life expectancy of less than five years
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has chronic genotype 1 HCV infection, fibrosis F0-F3, and stable opiate substitution therapy. He is not pregnant or unwilling to use safe contraception.
